00052 
00053 //
00054 // This is the common KviSelectorInterface
00055 //
00056 //     Note: I'm always learning
00057 //           Today I have discovered that:
00058 //              QObject * o = new KviBoolSelector(...)
00059 //              ((KviSelectorInterface *)o)->commit()
00060 //           Does not work (SIGSEGV when jumping into commit(): bad vtable entry)
00061 //           But the following works fine:
00062 //              KviBoolSelector * b = new KviBoolSelector(...)
00063 //              ((KviSelectorInterface *)b)->commit();
00064 //           Mmmmmh.... the assembler generated by gcc
00065 //           uses two different vtable offsets in the two cases
00066 //           why ?
00067 //
00068 
00069 class KVIRC_API KviSelectorInterface
00070 {
00071 public:
00072         KviSelectorInterface(){};
00073         virtual ~KviSelectorInterface(){};
00074 public:
00075         virtual void commit(){};
00076 };

00210 class KVIRC_API KviFileSelector : public KviTalHBox, public KviSelectorInterface
00211 {
00212         Q_OBJECT
00213         Q_PROPERTY(QString tmpFile READ tmpFile WRITE setTmpFile)
00214 public:
00215         KviFileSelector(QWidget * par,const QString & txt,QString * pOption,bool bEnabled,unsigned int uFlags = 0,const QString &szFilter = QString());
00216         ~KviFileSelector(){};
00217 public:
00218         enum Flags {
00219                 ChooseSaveFileName = 1,
00220                 DontConfirmOverwrite = 2
00221         };
00222 protected:
00223         QLabel      * m_pLabel;
00224         QLineEdit   * m_pLineEdit;
00225         QPushButton * m_pButton;
00226         QString     * m_pOption;
00227         unsigned int  m_uFlags;
00228         QString       m_szFilter;
00229 public:
00230         QString tmpFile(){ return m_pLineEdit->text(); };
00231         void setTmpFile(QString & szFile){ m_pLineEdit->setText(szFile); };
00232         virtual void commit();
00233         void setSelection(const QString &szSelection);
00234 signals:
00235         void selectionChanged(const QString &szNewValue);
00236 public slots:
00237         virtual void setEnabled(bool bEnabled);
00238 private slots:
00239         void browseClicked();
00240 protected:
00241         virtual void select();
00242 };
